title: Can Messi Be The GOAT Without World Cup?
description:
The FC crew debate whether Lionel Messi needs a World Cup trophy to be considered the greatest player of all time. Meanwhile, Brazil showcase high-flying form ahead of the World Cup while the United States continues to slump offensively. And a crucial Manchester derby is previewed in a very special way.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: Lionel Messi looking for elusive World Cup trophy; United States slumping into World Cup; Previewing a crucial Manchester Derby
